ygData.subject: Adventuring for fun and profit...
ygData.msgSnippet: Wooohoooo! I just bought all my level 16 spells that I need, and I still have almost 30 plat in the bank!  So I should be good to go once level 20 comes
ygData.messageBody:
Wooohoooo!

I just bought all my level 16 spells that I need, and I still have almost
30 plat in the bank! So I should be good to go once level 20 comes around,
hell, I might even be able to afford to try a little tinkering.

I am a gnome from Akanon, and over the last 2-3 days I've been doing a
little safari work to earn cash.

I imported several Polar Bear Cloaks, Wolfskin Belts and Wolfskin Boots
from Qeynos and Halos into Faydwer. And I must say, the market is
excellent in Faydwer, what with all the spell casters running around in
skimpy little bits of armor, I made a tidy little profit and had a great
time to boot.

Tonight, if all goes well, I'll collect some materials in Freeport and head
on back to stock up again. Yeeee haw!


Flik
